body_content.explanation: an amount of money that you pay regularly to receive a product or service:
examples: I decided to take out (= pay for) a subscription to a gardening magazine.
Your business can be listed on the website for a low monthly subscription.

body_content.explanation: an amount of money that you pay regularly to be a member of an organization or club:
examples: We bought our niece an annual subscription to the tennis club.

body_content.explanation: a season ticket (= a ticket that can be used many times within a limited period) for cultural events:
examples: His parents had a subscription to the local philharmonic orchestra.

body_content.explanation: an opportunity to buy shares in a company:
examples: You will soon have the opportunity to purchase stock through a subscription offering.
